body: I just recently found out about this, is there gonna be like a forum post warning about when it will start or is it MapDev only?
body_tagged: I just recently found out about this, is there gonna be like a forum post warning about when it will start or is it MapDev only?
title: /server mapdev

replies.body: its the map dev build serrver
replies.body_tagged: its the map dev build serrver

replies.body: I thought it was similar to OCN where it wasnt a build server but a server named after the mapdevs themselves and used as public map testing servers.
replies.body_tagged: I thought it was similar to OCN where it wasnt a build server but a server named after the mapdevs themselves and used as public map testing servers.

replies.body:
That's what it is, actually
However me and ParaSpider can enable/disable whitelist on it

replies.body:
Coolio! Everytime you guys disable whitelist and are playing a map, can you guys make a forum post to warn peeps so we can all have fun testing out unique maps?

:3

replies.body: It was going to be used in the first map testing, but since it was dead we decided to go on normal nebula (which didn't work out). Any further testing will be on mapdev and of course, be announced. ^_^
